description:
As a software developer I have not found a better font for code editing; and I have tried dozens of them.

JBNL ticks all the boxes, from distinguishing the usual glyphs that often look too similar, especially at small sizes, to correctly centering asterisk and various brackets which are used as normal character and operators in code.
I've been using JetBrains Mono for a long time, and I'm glad this already exists without having to install the Nerd font from anywhere else
